Gogolan:
You are cunning, Liono Prime, just as history has proved you to be... 
Because we see the logic in your reasonning, we can not force you to 
leave your weapons... But for security reasons, we demand that you 
conceal your weapons the best you can.

Ramiel:
Ah! you are just like my grandmother used to say you were! A true 
warrior, but not willing to take more risks than necessary!

Jetstorm:
Liono... so tell me, who is his granny?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> ::Liono::
> Liono laughs under his breath "You demand I trust you? A fat person 
demands 
> to be skinny and ugly person demands to be beautiful. Only a person 
with 
> dishonorable means would demand trust because it is the only way he 
can 
> receive it." Liono sighs "I will stay for the meeting but I will not 
remove 
> my weapons by reason your last statement gives me grounds not to 
trust you."
> 
> 
>
